paramInformation.label: Dimming Step
paramInformation.description: Percentage of step when switch is dimming up or down (0 = instant)

paramInformation.label: Minimum Level
paramInformation.description: Minimum dimming level for attached light

paramInformation.label: LED Indicator
paramInformation.description: Turn LED indicator ON when light is ON (paddle switch only)

paramInformation.label: Invert Switch
paramInformation.description: Invert on & off on the physical switch

paramInformation.label: Auto OFF
paramInformation.description: Automatically turn switch off after this number of seconds

paramInformation.label: Association Group 3 setting
paramInformation.description: Change how devices respond when associated in group 3

paramInformation.label: Default Level (local)
paramInformation.description: Default level when light is turned on at the switch (0 = previous level)

paramInformation.label: Default Level (Z-Wave)
paramInformation.description: Default level when light is turned on via Z-Wave command (0 = previous level)

paramInformation.label: Send command on local action
paramInformation.description: When should the switch send commands to Group 3 devices?

paramInformation.label: Send command on 3-way action
paramInformation.description: When should the switch send commands to Group 3 devices?

paramInformation.label: Send command on z-wave action
paramInformation.description: When should the switch send commands to Group 3 devices?

paramInformation.label: Send command on auto off timer
paramInformation.description: When should the switch send commands to Group 3 devices?
